source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a street in a Japanese town on an overcast, rainy day. The foreground features a wide, wet sidewalk and a lush flowerbed filled with bright yellow and purple blossoms. Cars can be seen driving along the wet road. In the background, a large golf driving range with high netting is prominent, surrounded by houses, trees, and numerous overhead power lines.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot of a street in a Japanese town on an overcast, rainy day. The foreground features a wide, wet sidewalk and a lush flowerbed filled with bright yellow and purple blossoms. Cars can be seen driving along the wet road. In the background, a large golf driving range with high netting is prominent, surrounded by houses, trees, and numerous overhead power lines.

bad_caption: A group of cyclists rides single file along a sunlit coastal boardwalk, passing by palm trees and sandy beaches. In the foreground, a street performer juggles colorful balls while pedestrians stop to watch. In the distance, a large amusement park with a Ferris wheel and roller coaster is visible, with seagulls flying overhead.
